LoadScriptContent: load [%DateKey] as RangeDate	//	source field should be the m/d/yyyy field from your fact table.
//	MinMaxDate finds the lowest and highest dates from the dates.
//	This has been proven to work much faster than a typical group by on your transaction table.
drop table temp;	//	no need to retain
drop table MinMaxDate;	//	no need to retain
LOAD 1 as FactType, //Load 1 FactRevenueByMoveIn, Load 2 OccupancybyMonth, Load 3 Inquiries, Load 4 Tours, Load 5 Move Ins
Concatenate(FactTable)//Load 1 FactRevenueByMoveIn, Load 2 OccupancybyMonth, Load 3 Inquiries, Load 4 Tours, Load 5 Move Ins
Concatenate(FactTable) //Load 1 FactRevenueByMoveIn, Load 2 OccupancybyMonth, Load 3 Inquiries, Load 4 Tours, Load 5 Move Ins
IF( RoomType='One Bedroom Deluxe' OR RoomType='One Bedroom' OR RoomType='Suite', '1 BR',
IF( RoomType='Alcove' OR RoomType='Studio' OR RoomType='Studio Deluxe', 'Studio',
IF( RoomType='Three Bedroom', '3 BR',  RoomType))))) as RoomTypeStyleCode,
//     IF( RoomType='One Bedroom Deluxe' OR RoomType='One Bedroom' OR RoomType='Suite', '1 BR',
//     IF( RoomType='Alcove' OR RoomType='Studio' OR RoomType='Studio Deluxe', 'Studio',
//     IF( RoomType='Three Bedroom', '3 BR',  RoomType)))) as RoomTypeStyleCode
IF(RoomTypeStyle='One Bedroom', '1 BR', IF(RoomTypeStyle='Two Bedroom', '2 BR', IF(RoomTypeStyle='Three Bedroom', '3 BR', RoomTypeStyle))) as RoomTypeStyleCode,
IF( RoomType='One Bedroom Deluxe' OR RoomType='One Bedroom' OR RoomType='Suite', '1 BR',
IF( RoomType='Alcove' OR RoomType='Studio' OR RoomType='Studio Deluxe', 'Studio',
IF( RoomType='Three Bedroom', '3 BR',  RoomType))))) as RoomTypeStyleCode,
//     IF( RoomType='One Bedroom Deluxe' OR RoomType='One Bedroom' OR RoomType='Suite', '1 BR',
//     IF( RoomType='Alcove' OR RoomType='Studio' OR RoomType='Studio Deluxe', 'Studio',
//     IF( RoomType='Three Bedroom', '3 BR',  RoomType))))) as RoomTypeStyleCode
